about_the_game:
Discover the demo of E-FCC, the airsoft simulation game inspired by Fast Close Combat (FCC), available on Steam!

Immerse yourself in the action with this demo version, which lets you explore the basics of 1-on-1 competitive gameplay, where every shot counts. In this demo, you'll get an overview of the game mechanics, realistic graphics, and strict rules that Fast Close Combat is famous for.

Contents included in the demo:

[1v1 online matches:[/b] Challenge another player to fast, intense games. The simple, competitive scoring system (2 sets of 30 points) lets you get to grips with the dynamics of duels.

[Basic FCC rules:[/b] Follow the fundamental rules of the FCC, with a simplified penalty system for minor infractions such as undeclared touches.

[Immersive environment:[/b] Get your first taste of realistic graphics and game physics, recreating the intensity of airsoft combat.

[Basic strategy:[/b] Discover the first strategic layers of the game, where every move and decision influences the course of the match.
This demo is a taste of the full game, allowing you to experience the basics of E-FCC's immersive, competitive gameplay.

Join us in the arena and get ready to perfect your E-FCC skills!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 / GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon™ RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080Ti / RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 6600XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Discover E-FCC, the official video game from Fast Close Combat, now available on Steam! Take on opponents 1-on-1 in realistic airsoft duels. Follow strict rules, avoid penalties and use strategy to win intense, immersive matches.
